title: Jane Eyre
creator_credit: British Broadcasting Corporation, Barry Letts and Julian Amyes
brief_description: Featuring Timothy Dalton and Zelah Clarke, Jane Eyre leaves a charitable institution to work for the mysterious Mr. Rochester. Thornfield is a house of many secrets and Jane embark’s on a journey of self discovery, where not only her values, but her chances of finding love and happiness, are threatened. Based on the novel by Charlotte Bronte.
